ComicInfo.Title: Fallen Leaves; Mal Occhio; The Bleeding Mirror
ComicInfo.Summary:

COVER/ [CONTENTS]: Bruce Spaulding Fuller
INSIDE FRONT COVER: Steve Bissette
FALLEN LEAVES: Story and Pencils/ Rick McCollum, Inks and Lettering/ Bill Anderson

THE BLEEDING MIRROR: Story and Art/ David Marshall
THE LOST 'GHOUL': Article/ Stan Wiater
